text: Balam hah lungpêkngeia lekhabulngeia miziek ania, pêka aom lâihan Pathien roiinpuina ânlang ani. Moses mâia vâr hah duoi tetet khomsenla, maha ala rât oka, Israelngei han an mitngei leh ama ha enlak thei mak ngeia. Balam mangin thina amintung ngâi luoi ha, madôra roiinpuina leh ajuongin chu,3:7: Jôk 34:29
